# Introduction
This Shiny app presentation is in order to provide overview of my application.

This project will calculate sum of all the integers upto the value provided by user.


# Functionality
- User provides an integer in the input field.
- Application reads that number and calculates sum upto that number.
- Application displays the result.


# Calculations
Application requires following library:
```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
library(numbers)
```

Following formula is used to calculate sum upto integer n:
```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
sum = n * (n + 1) / 2
```
